title: Drawing, Design for Renaissance-Style Sideboard in Plan and Elevation, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Renaissance-Style Sideboard in Plan and Elevation
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left corner: [square with dot at center]=V
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description:
Elevation view (with wall paneling suggested in background): massive carved Renaissance-style sideboard on low rectangular platform; top with molded cornices, surmounted by upper shelf supported by backsplash and 4 columns at center; backsplash decorated with 8 carved plaques along top edge and a vase with flowers on either end; front has center niche flanked by square doors decorated with carved panels showing coats-of-arms surrounded by strapwork cartouches; Four conforming drawers along top edge of front have carved floral plaques at interstices.
Plan view: rectangular sideboard with overlaid molding on top and irregularly shaped upper shelf.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Renaissance-Style Sideboard in Plan and Elevation, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-53
